Title: .hack//Tasogare no Udewa Densetsu: Offline de Aimashou
Description: ["It's a short story about the characters from .hack// Legend of the Twilight meeting offline. It's more to hear than to see. It shows only backgrounds from the real world with the heads of the charater-game-avatars; but it reveals some interesting real life informations about the characters. "]
Voices: ['Nakahara, Mai', 'Minagawa, Junko', 'Kaida, Yuki', 'Matsuoka, Yuki', 'Kawasumi, Ayako', 'Masutani, Yasunori']
